intro: This document serves as the Product Specifications and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product 2021. It provides comprehensive information for users, detailing the product's characteristics, production methodologies, and quality assessments. The CLC+ Backbone is a key component of the CLMS's new CLC+ Product Suite, offering an object-oriented, large-scale, wall-to-wall (EEA-38) high-resolution (HR) inventory of European land cover based on Sentinel-2 time-series data. The manual focuses on the 2021 update, excluding the UK, and includes specifications for the primary 11-class Raster Product, as well as additional quality layers and expert products.
